headline.main: Exclusive: Brazil Prosecutor Investigates Funds' Investment in Trump Hotel Rio
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Brazil Prosecutor Investigates Funds' Investment in Trump Hotel Rio

docs.snippet: A Brazilian prosecutor has opened a criminal investigation into investments made by two state pension funds in a luxury Rio de Janeiro hotel that is part of the Trump franchise, according to a court filing reviewed by Reuters on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Brazilian prosecutor has opened a criminal investigation into investments made by two state pension funds in a luxury Rio de Janeiro hotel that is part of the Trump franchise, according to a court filing reviewed by Reuters on Tuesday.

headline.main: Guardiola Savours Beating 'Best Team in World' Barca
headline.print_headline: Guardiola Savours Beating 'Best Team in World' Barca

docs.snippet: Pep Guardiola savoured a memorable night as Manchester City beat his old club Barcelona, "the best team in the world", 3-1 on Tuesday with a display that hinted he may be building something special....
docs.lead_paragraph: Pep Guardiola savoured a memorable night as Manchester City beat his old club Barcelona, "the best team in the world", 3-1 on Tuesday with a display that hinted he may be building something special.

headline.main: CFP Rankings: Texas A&M 4th Behind 'Bama, Clemson, Michigan
headline.print_headline: CFP Rankings: Texas A&M 4th Behind 'Bama, Clemson, Michigan

docs.snippet: Texas A&M was ranked fourth behind Alabama, Clemson and Michigan in the season's first College Football Playoff rankings....
docs.lead_paragraph: Texas A&M was ranked fourth behind Alabama, Clemson and Michigan in the season's first College Football Playoff rankings.

headline.main: Australia Striker Cahill Rested for Thailand Qualifier
headline.print_headline: Australia Striker Cahill Rested for Thailand Qualifier

docs.snippet: Australia talisman Tim Cahill will be rested for this month's World Cup qualifier against Thailand to allow him to fully recover from an Achilles complaint that ruled him out of domestic football last week....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australia talisman Tim Cahill will be rested for this month's World Cup qualifier against Thailand to allow him to fully recover from an Achilles complaint that ruled him out of domestic football last week.

headline.main: As South Sudan Troops Killed and Raped, U.N. Forces Didn’t Stop Them
headline.print_headline: U.N. Forces Failed to Stop Rampage, Report Says

docs.snippet: An investigation found that a peacekeeping mission failed to act in July as government soldiers carried out an attack on civilians, including aid workers....
docs.abstract: Report concludes United Nations peacekeepers stood idle while South Sudanese forces attacked civilians, including many Western aid workers, in Juba hotel in July 2016; episode stoked country's already bloody civil war and further discredited UN peacekeeping missions.
docs.lead_paragraph: An investigation found that a peacekeeping mission failed to act in July as government soldiers carried out an attack on civilians, including aid workers.

headline.main: UK to Announce Small Fiscal Boost, Keep Spending Options Open-FT
headline.print_headline: UK to Announce Small Fiscal Boost, Keep Spending Options Open-FT

docs.snippet: British Chancellor Philip Hammond will announce only a modest fiscal stimulus in the first post-Brexit vote budget statement later this month but will allow for more aggressive spending in future if needed, the Financial Times reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: British Chancellor Philip Hammond will announce only a modest fiscal stimulus in the first post-Brexit vote budget statement later this month but will allow for more aggressive spending in future if needed, the Financial Times reported.

headline.main: Infections, Not Antibiotics, May Be Tied to Childhood Obesity

docs.snippet: Some studies suggest giving antibiotics to infants may raise the risk of childhood obesity. But the infections themselves may be to blame....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some studies suggest giving antibiotics to infants may raise the risk of childhood obesity. But the infections themselves may be to blame.

headline.main: For Jason Sudeikis, It’s Time to Seize the Stage in ‘Dead Poets Society’
headline.print_headline: It’s Time to Seize the Stage

docs.snippet: The former “S.N.L.” star Jason Sudeikis plays the stage version of John Keating, the teacher made famous by Robin Williams....
docs.lead_paragraph: The former “S.N.L.” star Jason Sudeikis plays the stage version of John Keating, the teacher made famous by Robin Williams.

headline.main: College Football Playoff Ranking: Texas A&M Is a Surprise No. 4
headline.print_headline: In First Playoff Ranking, an Upset at No. 4

docs.snippet: The first three teams were, as widely expected, Alabama, Clemson and Michigan. But the Aggies slid ahead of undefeated Washington in the selection committee’s first rankings....
docs.abstract: College Football Playoff selection committee releases initial rankings of its third season, with defending champion Alabama at top spot; number four spot goes to Texas A&M University, surprise pick in light of their performance and their ranking by Associated Press poll.
docs.lead_paragraph: The first three teams were, as widely expected, Alabama, Clemson and Michigan. But the Aggies slid ahead of undefeated Washington in the selection committee’s first rankings.
